title: How to score 600+ in the NEET 2021 in just 45 days - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: For cracking competitive exam like NEET , following a strict routine will help you a lot to achieve your success and a bit of smart work can fetch you more marks in NEET…!!! FOLLOW some Mantra's 3P and R P: PATIENCE Studying for a long hours requires a lot of patience, never ever try to deviate your mind , preparing yourself mentally and physically is important , and taking GAP or having a snacks in between every 45 minutes or one hour …!!! P: PLAN 45 DAYS are more than sufficient for a people who are constantly working for years together … only thing to focus on last moment is to have PROPER PLAN for the upcoming days …. Have proper time table and work accordingly …. !!! P: POSITIVE In the last moment , we tend have many negative thoughts approaching us , never ever lend ur ears to those negative people , avoiding them would be the best , staying positive and thinking of your success should only be your target R : REVISION We tend to read , write and practice a lot , we might have put in our best level to complete the chapters , but forget to revise …. !!! As a final touch we should REVISE a lot ….!!! Among these the REVISION would be the best mantra for any exams … NOTE : BIOLOGY : Studying NCERT textbooks is more than sufficient …( line to line reading should be must ) PHYSICS : REVISING the FORMULA is the best astra … CHEMISTRY : CHEMICAL EQUATIONS and FORMULA have to revised atleast after a gap 5 days once …. concentrating on PERIODIC Table chapter by reading a text book would help a lot ….!!!! CAUTION: A word of caution , AVOIDING the social media (including Quora ) can be the best suggestion from my point of view….!!! After the exam you have a lot to enjoy and many thing will be waiting …. !!! ALL THE BEST GUYS …. !!!!

You have one year for NEET 2021….only 45 days is enough to get 600+ ah……dont overthink it……consistency is matter……if u get 450 mark in mock test in an whole year then u think about that 45 days to score 600+marks…….
